column1: This study investigates the role of certain psychosocial variables--sex, age, body image/self-esteem, self-consciousness, minor life events, and the degree to which an individual identifies with the cultural stereotype of masculinity--as correlates and antecedents to mild depression in adolescents and explores potential intraindividual mediators of the stress-depression relationship in adolescents.
